word: G5012 - ταπεινοφροσύνη - tapeinophrosýnē - tap-i-nof-ros-oo'-nay - Humbleness of mind

sections.paragraph: the having a humble opinion of oneself; a deep sense of one's (moral) littleness; modesty, humility, lowliness of mind, humble - minded, having a modest opinion of oneself
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a compound of G5011 and the base of G5424; humiliation of mind, that is, modesty: - humbleness of mind, humility (of mind), lowliness (of mind).
Cognate: G5011, G5012, G5013, G5014
